posts.title: Golden Temples of Kyoto
posts.description: A walk through ancient Japan — lantern-lit alleys, matcha ceremonies, and the quiet beauty of Arashiyama bamboo grove.

posts.title: Lost in the Medina of Marrakech
posts.description: Spice markets, rooftop riads, and the hypnotic sound of Jemaa el-Fnaa as the sun dips below the Atlas Mountains.

posts.title: Dawn at the Taj Mahal
posts.description: Arriving before sunrise to witness marble turn from grey to pink to gold — an experience that defies every photograph.
